item.title: Setting_up_hugo_site
item.description:
Setting up Hugo Site with PaperMod theme

Hugo Site Generate is quick, performant and easier to manage and maintain. I was able to setup everything in no time. I hope this will also help you

Reference Link: https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6BLFYo1wc0Q&t=133s https://github.com/robamu/my-website.git My Code: https://github.com/Stratagem360AI/AIGenesis.git https://blog.desigeek.com/about/

Steps at a high-level

  • Create a site
  • Add content
  • Configure the site
  • Publish the site

Prerequisite

  • Install Hugo

brew install hugo - Note: if you do not have brew package. Link: https://brew.sh (install this first and then above command)
